Returns: The total number of allowed run, the default is 1.
tolerance().Description: Indicates how many times a test can run and fail before being reported as a failed test. If the tolerance factor is less than 1, the test runs only once.
tolerance().history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 24

ClassDesc: Use This annotation can be used on an @B_android#test#InstrumentationTestCase_E@'s test methods. When the annotation is present, the test method is re-executed if the test fails. The total number of executions is specified by the tolerance and defaults to 1.
